parameters.html:
<style>
  body {
    margin: 0;
    height: 100vh;
    overflow: hidden;
    background: repeating-linear-gradient(
      -45deg,
      #296549,
      #296549 10px,
      #295a44 10px,
      #295a44 20px
    );
    background-size: 200% 200%;
    animation: move-stripes 60s linear infinite;
    will-change: background-position; /* Hint to optimize rendering */
  }

  @keyframes move-stripes {
    0% {
      background-position: 100% 100%;
    }
    100% {
      background-position: 0% 0%;
    }
  }
</style>

parameters.text: Items in this collection are all obtained by:
Enter Tom Nook's store on the last day of any month.  Bring any Raffle Tickets you've collected that month.
Wisp is the ghost that can be found after midnight between 12 AM and 4 AM.  Complete his task and he will give you an item or service.
A villager may post a Treasure Hunt on the bulletin board in a specific acre.
Talk to Katrina when she's in town.  If you have good luck, you may get one of these items.  If you do not talk to Katrina, your luck will always remain neutral.
